mainHero.title: Don't Lose Your Customers,
mainHero.subtitle: Move With Them!
mainHero.description: You don't know when your customers are moving, and they're too busy to remember your name. We instantly notify you when your customers list their home for sale, so you can be the first one to the new home.

items.title: One Click Upload and Update
items.description: No matter the size of your client list, just make sure the columns fit our guidelines and you'll be on your way in seconds.

items.title: Whatever you offer, your customers want it!
items.description: You've sold them once, now capitalize again!

features.title: Top User Experience
features.subtitle: Resell To Your Favorite Customers
features.description: Acquiring a customer is expensive, never lose one again because they moved and forgot about you

items.name: Backtested Data
items.description: Tracing back the history of your customers to demonstrate the expected results before you even have to sign a contract.

items.name: Updated Daily
items.description: Daily updates on which of your customers have moved, listed their home, or put their home up for rent so you are the first to know and first to act.

items.name: Easily Integratable
items.description: Customer service and development support to work with whatever type of customer list you have and ensure a no hastle workflow.

items.name: Delivering Premier Leads
items.description: Your business has already done the hard part of selling to these customers something that they love. We're here to offer you the easy chance of catching them right when they'll need your product again!

pricing.title: Contact Us
pricing.subtitle: Schedule a Demo, Ask a Question, or Get a Quote Today!

items.recentlySoldDescription: For businesses with less than 5000 customers and get data for all homes recently sold in your area

sections.name: Contact Us
sections.content: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English.

howto.title: How Does It Work?
howto.subtitle: A Quick Walkthrough To Demonstrate The Product
howto.description: Our service is easy to use, just follow these steps and you'll be on your way to never losing a customer again!

steps.title: Make Your Customer List
steps.description: Create a csv file of all off your customers with column headers of Client Name, Address, Zip Code, and State. A template is available on the dashboard.

steps.title: Upload The List
steps.description: Drag and Drop or Browse and Select to seamlessly upload your customer list

steps.title: Track Your Progress
steps.description: Receive daily emails, create notes, mark who has been contacted, and track all of your progress in one place

steps.title: Keep Your Customers, Increase Your Revenue
steps.description: You've already sold them once, now capitalize again!

faqs.question: How often do I get updates on which of my customers have moved or sold their home?
faqs.answer: The real estate data is gathered in real time throughout the day. Each morning you will receive a summary email notifying you of all the updates.

faqs.question: How much does it cost?
faqs.answer: Our pricing is based on the number of customers you have. You can find our pricing on the pricing page.

faqs.question: What sort of security measures do you have in place?
faqs.answer: We use the latest security measures to ensure your data is safe. This includes using Stripe to process payments, two factor authentication, and SSL encryption. All our data is stored on Amazon Web Services servers in the United States.

faqs.question: Do you do anything else with my customer list?
faqs.answer: Of course not! We only use your customer list to gather real estate data. We do not sell your customer list to anyone else or use it for any other purpose.

faqs.question: How do I get started?
faqs.answer: You can get started by signing up for an account on the pricing page. You can then begin by syncing with your customers with your CRM or uploading a list. You can also setup an onboarding call with us to get started.

faqs.question: What CRMs do you integrate with?
faqs.answer: We currently integrate with Service Titan and Hubspot. If you use a different CRM, you can still use our service by uploading a list of your customers and we are constantly working to add more integrations.
